1161:4: trividhasarvajñatākārasuparipūrṇābhisamayatvena sarvatra rūpādau jñānadharmasyāpratighātitvādayaṃ deśanādharmo na kvacitpratihanyate |
1161:23: apada ityasya prayogadarśanabhāvanāviśeṣāśaikṣamārgeṣu viśeṣaṇārthamapratihatalakṣaṇa ityādi pañcapadopādānam |
1161:46: abhyāsayogena tattathatāprāptau kathaṃ na vastudharmatvenānujātaḥ syādityāha |
1161:98: anyathā'śrotṛsaṃskārakaṃ vākyaṃ kurvāṇaḥ kathaṃ nonmattaḥ syāt |
1161:109: luptamapratītamadṛṣṭaṃ na luptamaluptaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ pratītamiti yāvat |
1161:118: yathā sarvadharmatathatāyā nānyā tathāgatatathatā kintarhi tadātmikā evaṃ subhūtitathatāpīti |
1161:119: na sā kasyacinna tathateti sarvasya sā tathatetyarthaḥ |
1161:129: paramārthatastu naivātra māyopamatve kaścidbhāvaḥ kvacidanugatiṃ sadṛśatā prāptaḥ |
1161:156: yathā māyādirūpasya na bhavanti caikānekasvabhāvāḥ svaparoditā bhāvā iti vyāpakānupalabdhyā |
1161:158: nāsiddho heturyasmātprekṣāvatāṃ pravṛtteḥ prayojanavattayā vyāptatvādarthakriyāyogyapadārthaviṣayo vicāro'
1161:161: sa cānyonyavyavacchedarūpatvājjñeyarūpo vā bhavejjñānarūpo veti vikalpaḥ |
1161:162: tatra yadyādyaḥ pakṣastadā parasparasaṃyuktasvabhāvo vā bhavet,
1161:163: bahubhirvā samānajātīyaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ parasparasāmarthyavidhṛtairasamāśliṣṭasvarūpaiḥ sāntaraiḥ parivṛto yadvā nirantarairiti pakṣatrayam |
1161:164: tatra prathame pakṣe yadyekena sahaikadeśena saṃyogo'
1161:170: tathā hi pūrvāṇurapareṇa sarvātmanā saṃyujyata iti |
1161:173: tathā'paro'pi pūrveṇa saṃyujyata iti svasvabhāvaṃ vihāya sarvathā pūrvarūpabhavanāttasya saṃyogāśrayasyāsattvam |
1161:176: yadi nāma samānajātīyaiḥ saṃsparśo neṣṭastathāpi chidrasyālokatamorūpatvādvijātīyairālokatamaḥ paramāṇubhirabhīṣṭa eva |
1161:185: ekaparamāṇvabhimukhasvabhāvāśca sarve parivārakāḥ paramāṇava iti svabhāvahetuḥ |
1161:188: asatā ca svabhāvenābhimukhyāyogāditi na cānaikāntikatāhetoḥ tataśca parivāryāvasthānābhāvena parivārakāṇāmaṇūnāmekadeśatāprasaṅgāttatvataḥ pracayābhāve tatsādhyārthakriyāvaikalyādeva tasya paramāṇornaikasvabhāvābhyupagamo yuktaḥ |
1161:192: tṛtīyastu nairantaryapakṣaḥ saṃyogapakṣamevānupatati tatparyāyatvāt na hyantarāladeśavirahiṇāṃ parasparasaṃśleṣaṃ muktā'
1161:196: athāsaṃyuktaḥ eva paramāṇurbahubhistu dikśabdavācyaiḥ samīpetaradeśāvasthitaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ parivṛta iti cenmatam |
1161:200: nyasya yadrūpamavadhāryate tadasattatra tattvena pārāvārādibhedavaditi nyāyānna bhūtārthena sāvayavatvamiti cet |
1161:202: pārāpārayorapi bahirarthavādināṃ vyapekṣābhedenāsāṅkaryāt pitāputrādivat tāttvikameva rūpamityabhyupagantavyam |
1161:203: yadapekṣayā hi tatpāraṃ na jātu tadapekṣayā tadapāramiti |
1161:210: atha saṃvedanabalādviṣayasthiterananubhūyamānatvenārthasyātyantaparokṣatvātsamanantarapratyayabalena pratiniyatasya kāryasyodayātadvyatirekeṇa kalpayitumaśakyatvācca svataḥ siddharūpamevādvayajñānamekasvabhāvaṃ paramārthato grāhyagrāhakabhāvarahitamahetukatve nityaṃ sattvādiprasaṅgānnityatve'
1161:211: rthakriyādyanupapatteśca svahetupratibaddhodayamudayānantarāpavargi kevalamanādibhavabhāvi bhāvābhiniveśavāsanāparipākaprabhāvādākārāstatra pratibhāsanta iti jñānātmako bhāvo yogācārairabhyupagamyate |
1161:212: tatrāpi kiṃ tvākārāstāttvikā eva kiṃ vā pratibimbādivadavicāraikaramyā iti vikalpaḥ |
1161:218: tathā hi yadyeka ākāraścalanādiviśiṣṭaḥ pratibhāsate tadā pariśiṣṭā apyākārāḥ pūrvākārāvyatiricyamānamūrtisvabhāvatvāttathāvidhā eva syuriti vaicitryākārānubhavo virudhyate |
1161:220: atha sukhādivannīlādaya ākārā anubhavātmakā evetyekasya citratvānabhyupagamānna yathoktadūṣaṇaprasaṅga iti matvā samānajātīyānyapi vijñānāni bahūni vijātīyajñānavat sakṛdutpadyanta iti varṇyate |
1161:224: tenaiveti pakṣe parivāryāvasthānābhāvenāvaśiṣṭānāṃ na digantarāvasthitiryathārthā bhavedataśca pūrvāparādidigbhāgenānutpatternīlādimaṇḍalasaṃniveśapratibhāso na syāt |
1161:225: anyeneti tu pakṣe svabhāvabhedalakṣaṇatvādvastubhedasyetyekatā kuta iti paramāṇuvicārabhāvī doṣaḥ samāpatati |
1161:226: nanvamūrtatvājjñānānāṃ na deśakṛtaṃ paurvāparyamasti tatkathamaṇuvanmadhyavartitvaṃ jñānānāṃ bhavet |
1161:229: stu yaddeśavitānapratibhāsināmākārāṇāṃ satyatvamicchatā jñānānāmadeśānāmapi satāṃ bahūnāṃ tathā deśavitānāsthānenotpādaḥ parikalpyate |
1161:230: anyathā hi yadyanekavijñānotpādakalpanāyāmapi tathā deśavitānotpādapratibhāso mithyā syāttadā'
1161:233: tasya cālīkatve kimanyat satyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti yat kiñcidetat |
1161:234: nanu tathāpyaṇavo mūrtā vijñānaṃ tvamūrtaṃ tatkathaṃ sa evātra doṣa iti cet |
1161:236: tathā hi tadeva nīlādi nairantaryeṇa bhāsamānamekena paramāṇvātmakamupagamyate |
1161:245: yugapadanekajñānodaye ghaṭapadādiviṣayaḥ pratīyamāno vikalpaḥ kramabhāvī na syāt |
1161:246: na caitacchakyate vaktuṃ nirvikalpakajñānānyeva yugapaditi tadanubhavaniścayadvāreṇa vikalpānāmutpatteḥ |
1161:247: tataśca na hīmāḥ kalpanāḥ svayamasaṃviditarūpā utpadyanta iti sakṛdanubhavaniścayaprasaṅgāt kramabhāvī vikalpo'
1161:251: tathā hi yaccitraṃ tadekaṃ na bhavati |
1161:260: viruddhayorapyekasvabhāvatve sakalaṃ viśvamekaṃ dravyaṃ syāttataśca sahotpādavināśādiprasaṅgo durnivāraḥ |
1161:262: na ca nāmni vivāda iti nānaikāntikatā ca hetoḥ |
1161:263: dṛṣṭānto mecakamaṇipratibhāsastāvat siddha ityapi na vaktavyam |
1161:267: pratibhāsamānasya nīlāderdeśakālāntarasthāt padārthānna bhedaḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate dvayorapratibhāsanenaitasmādidaṃ bhinnamityagrahāt |
1161:270: tasmādgrāhāgrāhakayorgrāhyāṇāñca parasparaṃ bhedāgrahāccitrādvayamevaikarūpaṃ pratyakṣe pratibhāsata iti |
1161:279: yadi ca bhedasyāgrahādadvaitaṃ kalpyate tadā abhedasyāsmādidamabhinnamityevaṃ rūpasyāgrahāt dvaitaṃ kiṃ na kalpyate |
1161:282: citraścetpratibhāsa iṣyate sa eva loke bhedapratibhāsa ucyata iti kathaṃ bhedāpalāpaḥ atha matam |
1161:288: līkatvānna virodho yato bhavatā doṣābhidhānenālīkatvamekatvamevākārāṇāṃ pratipādyate |
1161:291: tathā hi yadati sphuṭamābālapratītanīlādyākārarūpamanubhūyate tadalīkamananubhūyamānaṃ tu sphuṭapratibhāsyākāravyatiriktamadvayaṃ jñānaṃ yattatsatyamiti kimataḥ paramiha subhāṣitamasti |
1161:296: yathā duḥkhe sukhādirūpamasaṃvidyamānāścākārā nīlādayo vijñāna iti vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiḥ |
1161:302: tadā sādhyadharmaviparyaye sādhanadharmasya vācakapramāṇābhāvātkathaṃ sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikatvaṃ hetorna bhavedityapi na vaktavyam |
1161:303: yataḥ sāmānyena naivātra sādhyate na cātrānaikāntikatā |
1161:304: tathā hi dvividhaṃ saṃvedanaṃ mukhyaṃ gauṇañca |
1161:306: sa ca jñānasyaivāsādhāraṇaḥ svātmabhūto dharmaḥ kathamasata ākārasya syāt |
1161:307: tathā hi yadajñānarūpaṃ na tasya mukhyaṃ saṃvedanamasti |
1161:314: tathā hi yadasamarthaṃ na tasya gauṇaṃ saṃvedanaṃ yathā turagaviṣāṇasya |
1161:319: tasya ca vyāpakasya nivṛtteḥ saṃvedanasyāpi tadvyāptasya nivṛttireveti nāsattvādityasya hetoḥ saṃvedane'
1161:324: tatrāpi hi jalādyākāro yadi nāntarnāpi bahistadā tasyātyantāsataḥ kathaṃ saṃvedanaṃ syāditi tulya eva paryanuyogaḥ |
1161:332: tataśca yasya yena saha pratibandho nāsti na tattasmin saṃvedyamāne niyamena saṃvedyate,
1161:333: yathā jñānātmani saṃvedyamāne bandhyāsutaḥ ṃāsti ca tādātmya tadutpattilakṣaṇo dvividho'
1161:338: tataśca yo'yamākāro jñānasamānakālabhāvitvena bhavatā parikalpitastasyāhetukatve kathamapekṣā'
1161:342: pi yathā bhavatāṃ saṃvṛtyā jñānajñeyayoḥ pratibhāsanaṃ tathāsmākamapi nirākāre tāttvike jñāne tadapratibaddhaivā'
1161:347: asmākantu saṃvṛtyā jñānameva jñeyarūpamiti sambandhasyābhyupagatatvāttayoḥ pratibhāsanamaviruddham |
1161:348: atha mābhūdayaṃ doṣa iti hetumatvamabhyupagamyate tadā pratītyasamutpannatvādgrāhyagrāhakākārayoḥ kalpitatvābhāvāt paratatvatāsvabhāvaḥ prasajyate |
1161:350: yadyapyevaṃ tathāpi pāramārthikī sattā kuto labhyata iti |
1161:353: tathā hi vijñānasyāpi na pratyayodbhavāt svabhāvādanyā sattetyataḥ pratītyotpattyavinābhāvinī pāramārthikī sattā durnivārā |
1161:357: pyākāro nābhyupagamyate tadopalabdhilakṣaṇāprāptatvenānākārameva jñānaṃ sadā sarvaprāṇabhṛdbhiḥ saṃvedyata iti prāptam |
1161:362: tathā hi yadyantarbahirvākārāḥ sambhaveyustadā teṣāṃ saṃvedanopajanitavibhramabalena saṃvidyamānamapi jñānaṃ na niścinvantīti syāt |
1161:363: yadā tu nāntarna bahiste santi tadā kasyānubhavena vipralabhyeran yena saṃvedayanto'
1161:374: athāpi dvitīyaḥ pakṣastatrāpi pratibandho bhavannākārāṇāṃ tādātmyalakṣaṇo bhavenna tadutpattilakṣaṇaḥ tatsamānakālamanubhūyamānatvāt |
1161:382: atha grāhyagrāhakabhāvarahita eva sasamprayogavijñānaskandhasya svabhāvo niścitaḥ |
1161:384: tathā hi bhrāntivāsanā vidyata iti bhavatā'
1161:387: yadyādyastadā vitathākārābhiniveśavāsanaivāvidyā sā ca vāsanā śaktirucyate |
1161:389: tena pūrvapūrvasmāt kāraṇabhūtādavidyātmano jñānāduttarottarasya kāryasya vitathākārābhiniveśina utpatteravidyāvaśāttathākhyātiyukteti balāccitratvamāyātam |
1161:391: yato yathoktameva jñānaṃ samanantarapratyaya iti yatkiñcidetat |
1161:392: atha tatra vāsanātmikāḥ śaktayo bhinnā iti cet |
1161:396: tathaikajñānāvyatirekādvā śaktīnāmekatvaṃ vijñānasvarūpaṃ durnivāramiti kathaṃ samanantarapratyayabhedaḥ |
1161:397: atha neti dvitīyaḥ pakṣo matastadā muktāḥ syurayatnena sarvadehina ityādiprasaṅgo'nivāryaḥ |
1161:398: atha sarvameva pṛthagjanasya jñānamanāpannanīlādyākāroparāgaṃ pravartate tatraikatvahāniprasaṅgo na bhaviṣyati |
1161:399: acitrarūpatvāt nīlādisaṃvedanarūpatāttayā tasya vyavasthāpyate sā tatsaṃvedanarūpatvānna tu nīlādirūpāpatteḥ |
1161:400: tathā hyālambanagrahaṇaprakāra evākāro na tu tādrūpyam |
1161:401: yattu nīlādi bahiriva pratibhāsamānamālakṣyate tanna jñānākāratayā,
1161:402: api tu jñānaṃ nīlādisaṃvedanamanubhavan pratipattā mohāttathā bahīrūpeṇa nīlādikamadhyavasyatīti |
1161:404: tathā hi yadi nīlādinā sahagatasya kaścit pratibandho nāsti tadā kathaṃ nīlādisaṃvedanaṃ syāt |
1161:408: api tu tādrūpyotpattyaiva jñānasya savyāpāratā pratīyate sa eva tasyālambanagrahaṇaprakāra ucyate |
1161:412: tathā hi yadi nīlādi nāntarnāpi bahirasti tatkathamidamavikalpe cetasi sphuṭataramanubhūyata iti vaktavyam |
1161:413: na caitacchakyate vaktuṃ naiva pratibhāsata iti |
1161:418: yasmādyadi nirākārameva sarvaṃ jñānamanubhūtaṃ tadā tatpṛṣṭhabhāvināpi vikalpena pratiniyatasya nīlāderākārasyādhyavasāyo'
1161:421: uktamatra paratantratvaprasaṅgāt kathaṃ bhrāntāvasya pratibandha iti |
1161:427: tadā śuddhāvasthāyāṃ tat satyarūpaṃ kuto jātamiti vaktavyam |
1161:436: yadi hi viśuddhāvasthāyāṃ sarveṣāmākārāṇāṃ nivṛttiḥ sambhavettadā saṃbhāvyate evaitat |
1161:441: nisargasiddhatve hi pratiniyatāśrayaparigraheṇānāyattatvānna tathāvidhā sattā kasyacidviramet |
1161:444: sa tādṛśo hetudharmo yena pūrvapūrvapratipakṣakṣaṇabalenotpādāt pratiniyatakāraṇāyattasvabhāvatayā kasyacideva bhaviṣyatīti |
1161:448: ato yadā vicāryamāṇo bhāvānāṃ na kaścidaṃśarūpo'
1161:449: pi svabhāva eko bhāgarahitatayā siddhastadānekaḥ kathaṃ setsyati tatsamudayātmakatvādanekatvasyeti,
1161:458: kasyacit pratyakṣagṛhītavyāptikenānumānena gṛhyata iti yathāsvaṃ pramāṇena niścitapakṣadharmagrahaṇātkuto'navasthā |
1161:462: nyatra vicāravimardāsahiṣṇutvena tāttvikarūpavirahiṇi māyādirūpe kathaṃ vartitumutsaheta |
1161:463: bhāvadharmatvahāniprasaṅgāditi kathaṃ prasiddhadṛṣṭāntaṃ prati viruddhatā hetoḥ |
1161:465: māṃ prati dṛṣṭānta evobhayadharmānugato na siddho vijñānarūpeṇa māyādīnāṃ vastusattvenābhyupagamādato'
1161:468: tathā hi vijñānānāṃ sarveṣāmeva vastutvenābhimatānāṃ yathoditānumānavidhibhirnaiḥsvābhāvyaṃ pratipāditam |
1161:469: tato na svecchābalena vastūnāṃ tathā bhāvo lakṣyate,
1161:470: yena pramāṇabādhitasyāpi māyādervijñānarūpeṇa siddhatvādasiddho dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāditi na kiñcidetat |
1161:473: pi kathaṃ vipakṣādvyāvṛttirniścīyate hetoryena sandhigdhavyatirekadoṣaduṣṭatā na bhavatīti |
1161:481: ta anyonyaparihārasthitalakṣaṇe caikatvānekatve tasmādrāśyantarābhāvādekatvānekatvābhyāṃ svabhāvaḥ kroḍīkṛta iti sādhyaviparyaye hetorastyeva vyatireka iti kuto yathoktadoṣāvakāśaḥ |
1161:485: atha hetuḥ siddhastadā niḥbhāvatvamapi bhāvānāṃ siddham |
1161:488: tathā hi hetustāvadyathā siddhastathā vistareṇa pratipāditam |
1161:490: pi yadi nāma vidhirūpatayā sādhyate naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ,
1161:491: tathāpi vastvabhiniveśasya dustyajatayā tattvataḥ samastavastuvyāpinaiḥsvābhāvye niścayādyanutpādanādvyāmūḍhaṃ prati sarvabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāvyavahārayogyatāprasādhanānna pratijñārthaikadeśatā hetoryathopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānupalambhena nāstitvasyetyacodyam |
1161:492: atha mūḍhaṃ prati naiḥsvābhāvyameva tāvatsādhayitavyaṃ vyavahārārthamityabhiniviśyate |
1161:494: yadā tvekānekatvayoḥ svabhāvavyāpakayornivṛtyā vṛkṣanivṛttyā śiṃśapānivṛttivadbhāvikī svabhāvanivṛttiḥ sādhyate |
1161:499: tathā hyavisaṃvādako nyāyaḥ paramārtha iti paramārthaśabdena trirūpaliṅgajanitā buddhirabhidhīyate |
1161:500: tadā tasyā api saṃvṛtirūpatvāt kathaṃ paramārthatvam |
1161:510: sādhvetat kintu sakalaprapañcaparivarjitaparamārthasyānukūlatvādyathoktabuddheḥ paramārthatvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatāpi ca tata eva,
1161:513: tatra ca sāmānyalakṣaṇe tadbuddhisvarūpasyāntargatatvādyathā sarvadharmeṣu sattvādibhyo hetubhyo vināśitvapratyayo bhavannātmānaṃ virahaya bhavatītyacodyam |
1161:517: pi niḥsvabhāvatā pratyakṣaiva ghaṭaviviktabhūtala ivopalabdhe tadātmabhūto ghaṭavivekaḥ |
1161:534: paramārthata iti viśeṣaṇācca bhāvapratīteranapahnavena pratītibādhā nāstyeveti yatkiñcidetat |
1161:535: nirbījabhrānterayogāt kathaṃ tayā samāropita ākāra ityapi na vaktavyam |
1161:536: yataḥ satyena sahālīkāyāḥ bhrānteḥ kaḥ sambandhaḥ |
1161:539: ataḥ sāṃvṛtameva kāraṇaṃ pūrvamupādānamasyā na virudhyate |
1161:551: nanu hetumantareṇeṣṭārthāsiddheḥ sarvadharmanaiḥsvābhāvyaprasādhanāya hetoḥ parigrahaṃ kurvatā tasya sattābhyupagatā sarvadharmanaiḥsvābhāvyapratijñayā cāsatteti parasparavirodhāt svamātṛvandhyātvapratijñāvat svavacanavirodhaḥ |
1161:552: yato na hetostata eva niḥsvabhāvatā sidhyati,
1161:565: tathā hi sarva evānumānānumeyavyavahāraḥ parasparaparāhatasiddhāntāhitadharmabhedaparityāgenābālajanapratītaṃ dharmiṇamāśritya pravartate |
1161:567: anyathā yadi siddhāntāśrito heturdharmo dṛṣṭānto vā syāt,
1161:570: tathā svarūpāsiddhau dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇaścāsiddhiriti sarvathaiva dhūmasattvādibhyo dahanānityatādipratītivaikalyātsādhyasādhanavyavahārocchedaḥ syāt |
1161:573: yo hi pratibhāsamānaṃ dharmiṇamāśritya samāropitākāraniṣedhanāya sādhanaṃ prayuṃkte,
1161:575: tvayā tu pratibhāsamāna eva dharmī niṣidhyate |
1161:577: naivaṃ tathā hi paramārthata iti viśeṣaṇāt,
1161:578: pratibhāsamāne dharmiṇi samāropitabhāvikasvabhāvaniṣedhaḥ sādhyate na tu dharmasvarūpaniṣedha iti samānam |
1161:583: nahi pāramārthikasvabhāvatvena pratibhāso vyāpto yena tannivṛttau nivarteta |
1161:585: na caitacchakyate vaktuṃ yadyapi dvicandrādayo bahīrūpatayā'
1161:586: līkā jñānarūpatayā tu te pāramārthikā eveti pratibhāsanaṃ yuktamiti citrarūpatayā deśasthatayā ca teṣāṃ pratibhāsanāt |
1161:589: tasmānna dvicandrādayaḥ pāramārthikāḥ tathā ca pratibhāsanta iti pāramārthikasvabhāvanivṛtau pratibhāsanatā virudhyata iti tāttviko bhāvābhyupagamo na kāryaḥ |
1161:596: evañca bhāvābhāvasvarūpābhāve sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā jñānajñeyayorapratibaddhavṛttitvānna tadviṣayo vikalpaḥ sarvathā tāttvika iti siddham |
1161:599: tathā hi yadi nāma bāhye vastuni na pratibaddhastathā'
1161:601: syātsyeva tathā samānakālabhāvini vijñāne tadavyatiriktatvena tādātmyalakṣaṇa iti vikalpārūḍhapratibimbasya kenacit prakāreṇa vidhipratiṣedhābhyāṃ vyavahāraḥ |
1161:602: yato yathoditavidhinā vāsanāprabhavajñānābhāvena tatpratibimbavirahādvikalpānutpatteḥ kuto bhāvābhāvasvarūpābhāve vikalpa iti vaktavyam |
1161:606: nyathā prekṣāvattvahāniprasaṅgādataḥ satyālīkatvābhiniveśasya dustyajatayā kathaṃ sarvaviparyāsaprahāṇamiti |
1161:609: tadevaṃ bhāvābhāvavikalpābhyāṃ sarvavikalpasya vyāptatvādvyāpakābhāve vyāpyasyāsambhavāttattvato bhāvābhāvaparāmarśarahitānavicāraramaṇīyānantabahiḥsāravirahiṇaḥ kadalīskandhanibhān sarvabhāvānevaṃ sarvākārajñatādṛṣṭābhisamayakrameṇa prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayato bhāvanābalaniṣpattau keṣāñcinmaṇirūpādijñānavadutsāritasakalabhrāntinimitta eva svataḥ pramāṇabhūto yathābhūtārthagrāhitvānmāyopamādvayajñānātmasaṃvedano viśuddhasāṃvṛtakāraṇanirjātaḥ sarvaviparyāsaprahāṇādurukaruṇāprajñāsvabhāvaḥ sāṃvṛto jñānālokaḥ samupajāyate,
1161:610: pratītyasamutpādadharmatayā yathā na punaḥ kalpanābījaṃ prādurbhavati |
1161:613: vidyā ca yathārthajñānaṃ tāthāgatamapi yadi jñānaṃ bhavatāṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ tasmādavidyārūpatvādvidyāyāḥ samutpādābhāve kathamavidyāvinivṛttiryāvaccāvidyā na prahīṇā tāvatkathaṃ muktiriti |
1161:618: pi viruddhadharmodayādyathābhūtapadārthāvagamena viparyāsanivṛttau kutastannibandhanamavidyātvaṃ yena tadaprahāṇānmuktirasaṅgateti yatkiñcidetat |
1161:620: darśanameva paramaṃ tattvadarśanamabhipretaṃ na tu nimīlitākṣajātyandhādīnāmiva pratyayavaikalyādamanasikārato vā yaddarśanam |
1161:622: yasmācca yathoktameva tattvajñānaṃ muktyāvāhakaṃ nānyathātiprasaṅgādataḥ prāguktameva paramatattvadarśanaṃ grāhyaṃ,
1161:623: tena sarvadoṣavirodhinairātmyadarśane pratyakṣīkṛte sati tadviruddhatvāt kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇañca prahīyate |
1161:624: ataḥ pratibandhābhāvādravikiraṇavadapagatameghādyāvaraṇe nabhasi sarvatra pratītyasamutpanne vastuni tattvotpattyādikalpanārahite'
1161:628: pratibandhābhāve satyacintyaśaktiviśeṣalābhāt kimiti sakalameva vastu na prakāśayet |
1161:630: ato'yameva sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇe sarvākārajñatvādhigame ca paramaḥ panthāḥ,
1161:632: te hi māyākārā iva māyāṃ yathāvatprasiddhamātrā'
1161:636: ye tu tāṃ māyāṃ bālaprekṣakajanavatsatyatvenābhiniviṣṭāstadvadbhāvamapi te viparītābhiniveśādbālā ucyanta iti sarvamaviruddham |
1161:638: dvayaṃ māyopamaṃ cittaṃ tathyasaṃvṛtirūpameva śrutacintāmayena jñānena vyavasthāpya pratītyasamutpādadharmatayā sarvākārajñatādyaṣṭābhisamayakrameṇa sādaranirantaradīrghakālaviśeṣabhāvanayā bhāvayantaḥ saṃhṛtasakalavikalpamābhavamanubaddhaṃ māyopamādvayavijñānamātraprabandhamāsādayanti yogīśāḥ |
1161:640: prathamaṃ tu māyopamamiti sābhijalpaṃ vijñānaṃ vyavasthāpakaṃ tadanuguṇaṃ na tu mukhyapratipakṣabhūtam |
1161:641: tathā hi bāhyārthanaye pudgalanairātmyādibhāvanāpi na vasturūpañcetasyavasthāpya kriyate |
1161:643: bhāve bhāvanāvaiyarthyaprāpteḥ tasmāttatrāpyayaṃ paro nāmamātrānusyūtavikalpapratibimbe tattvāvabodhānukūlyabhāji vastvadhyavasāyo santuṣyati |
1161:644: tadatra nāmākārābhyāsāt kathaṃ jalpo na vivardhito bhavati |
1161:652: sattvaloke caturvidhasattvanikāyamakuśalinaṃ nānādevatādhimuktaṃ māninaṃ vidyāvantañcādhikṛtya yathākramamavanamanamūrdhvagamanamadhogamanaṃ ghoṣonnadanaṃ ca |
1161:653: aṣṭādaśamahānimittāni punareṣāmeva ṣaṇāṃ vikārāṇāṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrakriyābhedenākampat yāvat saṃprāgarjadityarthanirdeśādbhavanti |
1161:657: tathā hi pūrvā digunnamatyaparā digavanamatīti tṛtīyaḥ |
1161:660: ayameva viparyayeṇa ṣaṣṭha iti ṣaḍvikārā bhavanti |
1161:681: sambhārabhūmyādau samupārjitapuṇyajñānasambhāraiḥ pūrvaparikarmabhiḥ kṛtā niṣpāditā ye tairmāyopamadharmabhāvanāyāṃ kṣāntiradhimuktiḥ pratilabdhetyeke |
1161:691: pakṣiṇaḥ śakuneriti pakṣau dvāvasyeti pakṣī naro'
1161:714: lakṣīva lakṣyate ceti caturthaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ matam ||31|| iti |
1161:728: animittālambanajñānākāreṇa dānādisarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ svasantāne prādurbhāvāt samudāgame kartavye yat kauśalaṃ prajñāpāramitopāyalakṣaṇaṃ,
1161:757: evamapi na sarvairanuttarā samyaksambodhiḥ śraddhādibhiḥ prāpyetyāha |
1161:772: dhimātraiḥ śraddhādibhiḥ samyaksambodhiḥ subodhā mṛdubhistaireva durbodhetyarthādidamākṣiptam |
1161:798: dharmāṇāmanutpannatvena jñānāviṣayatvāt kathaṃ svabhisambhavānuttarā samyaksambodhiḥ kintarhyevaṃ dharmādhimokṣe'
1161:819: rūpādayo dharmiṇastadvyatiriktā vā tathatā rūpāditathatālakṣaṇo dharmastatpṛthagbhūto vā nivartamāno nivarteta |
1161:827: tasmānnivṛttyasambhavādeva kāraṇādyastasyāmeva dharmatāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ sarvānabhiniveśayogena sthitaḥ katamaḥ sa dharmo vivartate |
1161:838: saṃvṛtisatyāśrayeṇa svabhisambhavatvaṃ nirākriyamāṇaṃ paramārthato yadi sādhyate,
1161:845: tatra na kevalaṃ pratyakṣādibādhā kiṃ tarhyabhyupetabādhāpītyāha |
1161:847: vyavasthānaṃ na bhavatīti sarvadharmānutpādadharmanirdeśena yasmādekameva bodhyātmakaṃ sattvaṃ cittaṃ tadeva yātavyatvādyānaṃ bodhisattvayānaṃ buddhayānaṃ tathāgatabhūmisaṃgṛhītaṃ,
1161:908: tatra ca mātāpitrādīnāṃ dvayaṃ dvayamekaikaṃ kṛtvā pañcākārā vaktavyāḥ |
1161:917: svayaṃ sarvapāpānnivṛttasya dānādyeṣu pratipattyā sthitasya ca |
1161:918: tathaivānyeṣāṃ pāpanivṛttau samādāpanena kuśalapravṛttau samādāpanavarṇavadanasamanujñānākārairālambane mūrddhagatamudyata iti |
1161:925: yathā mūrddhasu svaparādhiṣṭhānabhedenālambanākārabhedo vyākhyātastathā duḥkhādisatyacatuṣṭayaprathamaphalādikaṃ pramuditādibhūmiñca svayaṃ parijānato'
1161:941: adhimātraṃ mātrādicittotpādena tadātve cāyatyāñca pareṣāmiṣṭopasaṃhārakāmatāmupādāya nirdiṣṭam |
1161:947: mṛdvī madhyādhimātrā ca kṣāntiryathākramameva satyeṣu yāvadbodhisattvanyāmāvakrāntāvityanenānyeṣāmāryamārge prathamaphalādau buddhatve ca niyoktukāmatāmupādāyoktam |
1161:949: mṛdumadhyādhimātrāstvagradharmā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pareṣāmaviśeṣeṇa yānatraye paripācanāya viśeṣeṇa bodhisattvamārge niyojanāya sarvasampatprakarṣaniṣṭhādhiṣṭhānakāmatāmupādāya sattvaparipācanānāvaraṇarūpasaddharmasthitivacanenoktāḥ |
1161:960: bhisamaye bhāvanottarottarāvasthāviśeṣeṇa sarvākāraviśeṣamārgasaṅgṛhītaṃ jñānamanāsravaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrakrameṇotpadyata iti sakṛdutpattinirāsāya nirvedhabhāgīyādivyapadeśo'
